comments:
This problem happens on the Linux/GTK build once in a while when switching
layouts and then doing a pause/reload. When reload is pressed, the following
exception gets generated:
=========================================================================
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jem.proxy 2 0 Apr 14, 2004 11:43:27.148
!MESSAGE
+++ Warning +++: Wed Apr 14 11:43:27 EDT 2004    Project (Test)-VM for
MyJP1.java:err>java.lang.NullPointerException
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jem.proxy 2 0 Apr 14, 2004 11:43:27.149
!MESSAGE
+++ Warning +++: Wed Apr 14 11:43:27 EDT 2004    Project (Test)-VM for
MyJP1.java:err>
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jem.proxy 2 0 Apr 14, 2004 11:43:27.152
!MESSAGE
+++ Warning +++: Wed Apr 14 11:43:27 EDT 2004    Project (Test)-VM for
MyJP1.java:err>  at
org.eclipse.jem.internal.proxy.vm.remote.ConnectionHandler.run(ConnectionHandler.java(Compiled
Code))
        at
org.eclipse.jem.internal.proxy.vm.remote.ConnectionThread.run(ConnectionThread.java:47)
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jem.proxy 2 0 Apr 14, 2004 11:44:27.156
!MESSAGE
!STACK 0
========================================================================

error dialog which opens on the editor.
